channel.title: [Help] Changeing Npc killcount to enter godwars [help]

item.title: [Help] Changeing Npc killcount to enter godwars [help]
item.dc:creator: @weed4u weed4u
item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

if(objectID == 2467){ if(saraKills > 10){ toX = 2740; toY = 5074; saraKills = 10; sM("The Saradomin kills drain from you.."); } else sM("You need at least 10 Saradomin kills to get in the cave."); }
Changeing these guyes idk how the command evan tells it that its the saradomin wizard.
heres another code that has saraKills in it

characterfile.write("character-saradomin = ", 0, 22); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(saraKills), 0, Integer.toString(saraKills).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Idk if that has to do with anything

i Dont want it to be saradomin i want it to be hobgoblins and hellhounds

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Changeing Npc killcount to enter godwars [help]
